name: Mapy.cz interactive POI icons
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://mapy.cz"),
               url-prefix("https://mapy.cz"),
               url-prefix("http://www.mapy.cz"),
               url-prefix("https://www.mapy.cz"),
               regexp("https?://[a-zA-Z0-9]+\.dev(:[0-9]+)?/.*")

{


/* was ="card-poi" */
a[data-log-action],
img[src^="//api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon"]
{
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.05s ease-in-out;
    transition: transform 0.05s ease-in-out;
    
    -webkit-transform: scale(1);
    transform: scale(1);

    -webkit-transform-origin: 50% 50%;
    transform-origin: 50% 50%;

    /*border: 1px solid red;*/
    cursor: pointer !important;

    border-radius: 50%;
    padding: 4px;
    
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.0);
    background-position: center center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

/* was ="card-poi" */
a[data-log-action]:hover,
img[src^="//api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon"]:hover 
{
    -webkit-transform: scale(1.25);
    transform: scale(1.25);
    
    background-color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.75);
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75);
    
    cursor: pointer !important;
	
    z-index: 1;

}

/* colors for :after */
a[data-log-action][style*="http://api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon/1"]:after,
a[data-log-action][style*="http://api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon/27"]:after,
a[data-log-action][style*="http://api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon/28"]:after,
a[data-log-action][style*="http://api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon/158"]:after,
a[data-log-action][style*="http://api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon/285"]:after,

{ color: rgb(32,160,80) !important; }

a[data-log-action][style*="http://api.mapy.cz/poiimg/icon/72"]:after,
